com.facebook.buck.cli

Class TestRun.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.cli.TestRun.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    TestRun

    @NotThreadSafe
public static final class TestRun.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds instances of TestRun. Initialize attributes and then invoke build() method to create immutable instance.

    Builder is not thread safe and generally should not be stored in field or collection, but used immediately to create instances.

    • Method Detail

      • from

        public final TestRun.Builder from(com.facebook.buck.cli.AbstractTestRun instance)
        Fill builder with attribute values from provided AbstractTestRun instance. Regular attribute values will be overridden, i.e. replaced with ones of an instance. Instance's absent optional values will not be copied (will not override current). Collection elements and entries will be added, not replaced.
        Parameters:
        instance - instance to copy values from
        Returns:
        this builder for chained invocation
